content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_Zoning]
(
    zone_id NVARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
    zoning_code NVARCHAR(10) NULL,
    description NVARCHAR(128) NULL,
    max_height_m INT NULL,
    far FLOAT NULL,
    allowed_uses NVARCHAR(256) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_Companies]
(
    company_id NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    company_name NVARCHAR(200) NULL,
    registration_number NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    industry NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    address NVARCHAR(256) NULL,
    board_members NVARCHAR(1024) NULL,
    ownership_share NVARCHAR(256) NULL,
    status NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    last_updated DATETIME2(3) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_People]
(
    person_id NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    full_name NVARCHAR(200) NULL,
    national_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    dob DATE NULL,
    role NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    associated_company NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    associated_parcels NVARCHAR(1024) NULL,
    contact_email NVARCHAR(256) NULL,
    watchlist_status NVARCHAR(50) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

-- Optional curated join landing
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_Property]
(
    parcel_id NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    building_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    zoning_code NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    company_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    person_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    last_transaction_date DATETIME2(3) NULL,
    valuation_amount DECIMAL(18,2) NULL,
    area_sq_m DECIMAL(18,2) NULL,
    currency_code CHAR(3) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
